title: Clarendon
content: Can anyone suggest a san serif font to use for body text that compliments [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418223455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Clarendon)? I'm tired of Helvetica.
author: Rachel C

comments.content:
Maple  
Dyna Grotesk  
Bureau Grotesque  
John Sans

Anything Grotesque, jeje.

Héctor

Compliments or complements? :-)

What is the intended usage of the font?
